DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text field to describe a participant's history of other opportunistic infections

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Other Opportunistic Infection Personal Medical History
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._An infection caused by an organism which becomes pathogenic under certain conditions, e.g., during immunosuppression.:A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._An infection caused by an organism which becomes pathogenic under certain conditions, e.g., during immunosuppression.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Infection caused by an organism that is capable of causing disease in immunocompromised patients only (e.g. HIV-positive or transplanted patients).--2004

Property.preferredDefinition: an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredName: Chronic or Associated Diseases and Exposures
ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: chronic diseases, as well as diseases and exposures associated with cancer.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

Be specific about something; define clearly.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 7/19/17 jk transferred context and added registration status, CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 4/28/15 released. jc  4/7/15 VD versioned per COG WG: inc to 100 char, remove min limit, chg concept domain to assessment result. jc 1/25/13 added ACRIN Old caBIG CSI.  3/21/12 - changed origin from IVI to ACRIN.  3/5/08 - released for UoWASH FES CRF.   7/23/07-created for ACRIN PET CDEs
